Type.Name: FileChooserWidget

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileChooserWidget extends Gtk.VBox implements class GLib.IWrapper, class Gtk.IFileChooser

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Widget to allow the selection of files from a directory.

remarks.para: is a widget suitable for selecting files. It is the main building block of a . Most applications will only need to use the latter; you can use GtkFileChooserWidget as part of a larger window if you have special needs.
Note that does not have any methods of its own. Instead, you should use the functions that work on a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Gtk.FileChooserAction action) cil managed

Docs.param: a , the action this chooser will perform
Docs.summary: Public constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int raw) cil managed

Docs.param: a , pointer to underlying C object
Docs.summary: Constructor for internal use.
Sets the type of operation that that the chooser is performing; the user interface is adapted to suit the selected action.
Docs.remarks: For example, an option to create a new folder might be shown if the action is but not if the action is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddFilter(class Gtk.FileFilter filter) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds to the list of filters that the user can select between.
Docs.remarks: When a filter is selected, only files that are passed by that filter are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool AddShortcutFolder(string folder) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a folder to be displayed with the shortcut folders in a file chooser.
Docs.remarks: Note that shortcut folders do not get saved, as they are provided by the application. For example, you can use this to add a "/usr/share/mydrawprogram/Clipart" folder to the volume list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool AddShortcutFolderUri(string uri) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a folder URI to be displayed with the shortcut folders in a file chooser.
Docs.returns: a , true if the folder could be added successfully, false otherwise.
Docs.remarks: Note that shortcut folders do not get saved, as they are provided by the application. For example, you can use this to add a "file:///usr/share/mydrawprogram/Clipart" folder to the volume list.

Docs.summary: Indicates a file overwrite has been requested.
Docs.remarks:
This event is raised when the user has selected a file name that already exists and the file chooser is in mode.
Most applications just need to turn on the property and they will automatically get a stock confirmation dialog. Applications which need to customize this behavior should do that, and also connect to this event.
A connected to this event must set to the value indicating the action to take. If the handler determines that the user wants to select a different filename, it should return . If it determines that the user is satisfied with his choice of file name, it should return . On the other hand, if it determines that the stock confirmation dialog should be used, it should return .

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.remarks: To be added.

Docs.summary: The current folder for the file chooser, when the chooser has selected a local filename.
Event raised when the chooser changes the folder it's looking at.
To be added.
Docs.remarks: To be added.

Docs.summary: The file chooser's current folder, if set from a URI.
Property to represent the current name in the file selector, as if entered by the user.
Docs.remarks: Note that the name passed in here is a UTF-8 string rather than a filename. This function is meant for such uses as a suggested name in a "Save As..." dialog.

Docs.summary: Enables Overwrite Confirmation in the widget.
Docs.value: is if confirmation should be performed.

Docs.summary: An application-supplied widget to provide extra options to the user.
To be added.
Docs.remarks: To be added.

Docs.summary: This signal is emitted when the user "activates" a file in the file chooser.
Docs.remarks:
This event can happen by double-clicking on a file in the file list, or by pressing Enter.
Normally you do not need to connect to this signal. It is used internally by the file chooser code to know when to activate the default button in the dialog.

Docs.summary: The current filename selected by the file chooser.
The filenames selected by this widget.
To be added.
Docs.remarks: To be added.

Docs.summary: The currently-applied file filter.
The filters currently in use by this widget for patterns of files to display.
The for this object.
Sets whether only local files can be selected in the file selector.
Docs.remarks: If true (the default), then the selected file are files are guaranteed to be accessible through the operating systems native file file system and therefore the application only needs to worry about the filename functions in , like , rather than the URI functions like .

Docs.summary: Internal function; gets the filename that should be previewed in a custom preview.
Docs.remarks: Not for general programmer use.

Docs.summary: The URI that should be previewed in a custom preview widget.
An application-supplied widget to use to display a custom preview of the currently selected file.

remarks.para:
To implement a preview, after setting the preview widget, you connect to the
signal, and check or
on each change. If you can display a preview of the new file, update your widget and set the preview active using
Otherwise, set the preview inactive.

When there is no application-supplied preview widget, or the application-supplied preview widget is not active, the file chooser may display an internally generated preview of the current file or it may display no preview at all.

Docs.summary: Sets whether the preview widget set by should be shown for the current filename.
Docs.remarks: When this property is set to false, the file chooser may display an internally generated preview of the current file or it may display no preview at all.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SelectFilename(string filename) cil managed

Docs.summary: Selects a filename.
Docs.remarks: If the file name isn't in the current folder of the file chooser, then the current folder of the file chooser will be changed to the folder containing .

Docs.summary: This event is raised every time the selected file changes.
Sets whether multiple files can be selected in the file selector.
Docs.remarks: This is only relevant if the action is set to be or . It cannot be set with either of the folder actions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SelectUri(string uri) cil managed

Docs.summary: Selects the file at . If the URI doesn't refer to a file in the current folder of the file chooser, then the current folder of the file chooser will be changed to the folder that's part of .
Docs.returns: a , true if both the folder could be changed and the URI was selected successfully, false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetCurrentFolder(string filename) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the current folder for the file chooser from a local filename.
Docs.remarks: The user will be shown the full contents of the current folder, plus user interface elements for navigating to other folders.

Docs.returns: a , true if the folder could be changed successfully, false otherwise
Docs.remarks: The user will be shown the full contents of the current folder, plus user interface elements for navigating to other folders.

Docs.summary: Sets as the current filename for the file chooser; If the file name isn't in the current folder of the file chooser, then the current folder of the file chooser will be changed to the folder containing .
Docs.returns: a , true if both the folder could be changed and the file was selected successfully, false otherwise.
Docs.remarks:
This is equivalent to a sequence of
followed by .
Note that the file must exist, or nothing will be done except for the directory change. To pre-enter a filename for the user, as in a save-as dialog, use .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetUri(string uri) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the file referred to by as the current file for the the file chooser.
Docs.returns: a , true if both the folder could be changed and the URI was selected successfully, false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnselectFilename(string filename) cil managed

Docs.summary: Unselects a currently selected filename.
Docs.remarks: If the filename is not in the current directory, does not exist, or is otherwise not currently selected, does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnselectUri(string uri) cil managed

Docs.summary: Unselects the file referred to by .
Docs.remarks: If the file is not in the current directory, does not exist, or is otherwise not currently selected, does nothing.

Docs.summary: This signal is emitted when the preview in a file chooser should be regenerated. For example, this can happen when the currently selected file changes.

remarks.para: You should use this signal if you want your file chooser to have a preview widget.

Once you have installed a preview widget with , you should update it when this signal is emitted. You can use the properties or
to get the name of the file to preview. Your widget may not be able to preview all kinds of files; your callback must set to inform the file chooser about whether the preview was generated successfully or not.
TODO: insert example from gtkfilechooser-preview in gtk+ docs.

Docs.summary: The URI for the currently selected file in the file selector.
Docs.remarks: If multiple files are selected, one of the filenames will be returned at random. If the file chooser is in folder mode, this function returns the selected folder.

Docs.summary: The URIs selected by this widget.
Sets whether the file chooser should display a stock label with the name of the file that is being previewed; the default is true.
Docs.remarks: Applications that want to draw the whole preview area themselves should set this to false and display the name themselves in their preview widget.
